mapper.select:
SELECT a.CBIC01, d.CBPA07, c.CALA08, b.CBPB12,b.CBPB08, a.CBIC10,a.CBIC08,a.CBIC02 FROM CBIC a
LEFT JOIN CBPB b on a.CBIC09=b.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN CALA c on c.CALA01=b.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN CBPA d on d.CBPA01=b.CBPB14 where a.CBIC06=0

SELECT d.CBPA07, c.CALA08, b.CBPB12,b.CBPB08, a.CBIC10,a.CBIC08,a.CBIC02 FROM CBIC a
LEFT JOIN CBPB b on a.CBIC09=b.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN CALA c on c.CALA01=b.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN CBPA d on d.CBPA01=b.CBPB14 where a.CBIC06=0 and b.CBPB12 like concat('%', #{cbpb12}, '%')
and date_format(a.CBIC02,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBIC02,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
